title: Handle Live Sports Rain Delay
description: A live broadcast of a baseball game is interrupted by a rain delay. The agent must switch to filler content.

tasks.description: Receive notification of the rain delay from the on-site production crew.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent is informed of the delay.

tasks.description: Switch the live broadcast feed to a pre-prepared 'rain delay' content package (e.g., highlights, interviews).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully switches the feed to the filler content.

tasks.description: Display a message on screen informing viewers of the delay.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent activates an on-screen graphic with the rain delay information.
